item.title: Trump, Trudeau to meet at Mar-a-Lago amid tariff threats
item.description: The expected meeting comes after Trump threatened sweeping 25% tariffs on goods from Mexico and Canada.

item.title: Black Friday online sales on track to hit record high: What are people buying?
item.description: Black Friday online shopping this year is on pace to break a record with between $10.7 billion and $11 billion in sales, according to Adobe Analytics.

item.title: Democratic members of Congress get bomb threats on Thanksgiving
item.description: The homes of multiple Democratic members of Congress were targeted by bomb threats on Thanksgiving Day.

item.title: FAA reports record number of flights for Thanksgiving so far
item.description: Airlines are seeing record travel numbers for Thanksgiving this year, according to the Federal Aviation Administration.

item.title: Biden to display AIDS Memorial Quilt on White House South Lawn for 1st time
item.description: President Joe Biden and first lady Jill Biden will commemorate World AIDS Day at the White House on Sunday by displaying an AIDS Memorial Quilt on the...
